title: Tom Brady sits in endzone and cries during one point deficit during Titans game
body:
Upon being one point down and wanting to do other things, Tom Brady proceeded to run the ball to his endzone and started crying because the match against the Titans wasn't an obvious win for him 
"My teammates aren't working with me," Brady moaned towards reporters. "I should have like ten Super Bowl wins by now, but my team is holding me back. I decided to just sit in our endzone and speed things up, because I don't want to play this game anymore."
Belicheck was speechless, but he understood, especially since the ball was too heavy with all the air in it.
